Articles.Content:
I recently downloaded TiberDyne add-on, because so many people praise it, and it's really cool, beside the cockpit it's the same ugly stock cockpit, all other capsule have cool IVAs view with exemption for shuttle.

Can someone recommend my good add-on replacing standard shuttle cockpit???
I can recommend the TouhouTorpedo MK 3 Cockpit Internals Mod

I can recommend the TouhouTorpedo MK 3 Cockpit Internals Mod

It doesn't work, i downloaded it copied to KSP directory, but it not work, the same ugly cockpit.

It doesn't work, i downloaded it copied to KSP directory, but it not work, the same ugly cockpit.

That's because it only affects IVA.

That's because it only affects IVA.

But IVA don't changed when i installed Add-on, when i switched to IVA nothing has changed.

But IVA don't changed when i installed Add-on, when i switched to IVA nothing has changed.

Are you sure that you installed it correctly? It's not like just any other mod to install it... It's a bit weird..

And for the love of god, will people stop posting help/how to things in General Discussion? It's getting REALLY annoying. There is a forum specifically designed to handle this type of stuff, so please, use it.

You want it to work with the tiberdyne part, right? So you'll need to edit the part.cfg of that part. Find the lines:

INTERNAL
{
  name = GenericSpace3
}

and change them to

INTERNAL
{
  name = GenericSpace3TTUPGRADE
}

You want it to work with the tiberdyne part, right? So you'll need to edit the part.cfg of that part. Find the lines:

INTERNAL
{
  name = GenericSpace3
}

and change them to

INTERNAL
{
  name = GenericSpace3TTUPGRADE
}

Which file change?

So you'll need to edit the part.cfg of that part.

You edit that file^

You edit that file^

Witch part.cfg, it's quite lot of them and i want to knew which one
The one in the folder for the part you want to change.

The one in the folder for the part you want to change.

I want change shuttle cockpit, but i didn't knew the file name

The one in the folder for the part you want to change.

I want change shuttle cockpit, but i didn't knew the file name

I already do this but nothing has changed

The B9 aerospace pack has a beautiful shuttle-like pod. I don't recall if the internals are finished on it yet, but the outside is very pretty. Unfortunately it doesn't match Stock all that well, so if that's all you use, you'll have this amazing pod making the rest of your shuttle look ugly.
